definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:Fat</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">999999</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="world_play_sound_on_clientside"><field name="sound">CUSTOM:vine_boom</field><field name="soundcategory">neutral</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="decay"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:show_nikocado</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">40</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:show_nikocado</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
